resources.string: This coffee has a bold and slightly bitter taste. Are you sure to continue?

Composition: 1 shot of espresso (about 1 oz). Description: A strong, concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee under high pressure. It serves as the base for many other coffee drinks and has a rich, bold flavor with a creamy layer of foam on top, known as crema.

Composition: 1 part espresso + 2 parts steamed milk + a thin layer of foam. Description: A creamy and smooth coffee drink with a mild coffee flavor, perfect for those who enjoy the richness of milk. The thin foam layer on top adds a velvety texture.

Composition: 1 part espresso + 1 part steamed milk + 1 part milk foam (equal thirds). Description: A harmonious balance of strong espresso, creamy steamed milk, and airy foam. It\'s typically served in smaller portions compared to a latte and has a more pronounced coffee flavor.

Composition: 1 part espresso + 1 part steamed milk + 1 part chocolate syrup (or powder) + optional whipped cream. Description: A chocolate lover\'s coffee drink that combines the boldness of espresso with the sweetness of chocolate and creaminess of milk. It\'s a delightful treat, often topped with whipped cream or cocoa powder.

Composition: 1 shot of espresso "stained" with a small amount of milk foam (for a traditional macchiato) or layered with steamed milk and foam (for a modern macchiato). Description: The traditional macchiato is a bold espresso with just a hint of milk to soften it, while the modern versions (like caramel macchiatos) are sweeter and milkier.

Composition: 1 part espresso + 2 parts hot water (or a 1:1 ratio for a stronger flavor). Description: An Americano is a diluted espresso that mimics the strength and consistency of regular black coffee but retains the rich flavor of espresso.
